scripts.makeS3Bucket: pipenv run awslocal s3 mb s3://bucket-of-lambdas
scripts.createLambda: pipenv run awslocal lambda create-function --function-name my-lambda --runtime nodejs12.x --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --handler index.handler --role fake-role
scripts.buildAndDeployLambda: npm run postBuild && npm run makeS3Bucket && npm run createLambda
scripts.invokeLambda: pipenv run awslocal lambda invoke --function-name my-lambda response.json
